name.ja: マナドゥム・ヒアレス

text.en: If you control "Visas Starfrost" or a monster with 1500 ATK/2100 DEF, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Manadome Hearless" once per turn this way. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Manadome Hearless" from your Deck, also Synchro Monsters you control gain 500 ATK during each Battle Phase this turn.
